pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gentoo SELinux base policy. This contains policy for a system at the end of system installation. There is no extra policy in this package.

use.flag: Enable the labeled networking peer permissions (SELinux policy capability).
Enable the open permissions for file object classes (SELinux policy capability).
Enable User Based Access Control (UBAC) in the SELinux policy
Enable support for the unconfined SELinux module
